data.actual_result: The button’s status flickers from on and off, animation occasionally stops halfway.
data.short_description: Connections “Display on Profile” buttons stutter and reset occasionally when selecting the button and the “Add” button at the same time
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into your connections menu - Using two fingers, select the button next to one of your connections AND the “Add” button on the top right - Observe
